title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 04 May 2016 - XWiki
content:

11:23 <Aranjedeath-> has quit  
11:25 <Enygma`> has quit  
11:26 <lkrejci> has quit  
11:26 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
11:47 <yflory> Hello!  
11:48 <yflory> I'd like to post a Blog article on xwiki.org but I'm not allowed to create a page in the Drafts space : http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/Drafts/  
11:51 <mflorea> Enygma` yflory complains about the access rights on Blog.Drafts  
11:51 <mflorea> I don't see any special rights set  
11:52 <evalica> mflorea: yflory: Enygma` is in a meeting right now - I'll ask him to verify soon  
11:52 <mflorea> ok  
11:56 <Enygma`> has quit  
12:30 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
12:51 <Enygma`> yflory: you are right. I forgot to overwrite the right from the Blog parent space. Thanks  
12:51 <Enygma`> can you please try it now?  
12:55 <lkrejci> has quit  
12:56 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
13:06 <yflory> has quit  
13:15 <yflory> has joined #xwiki  
13:18 <yflory> Enygma`: It works, thanks!  
13:18 <yflory> Can someone review the article, please? http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/Drafts/CreateApplicationsWithXWebIDE/  
13:22 <Enygma`> yflory: looking...  
13:32 <Enygma`> nice feature-presentation article, yflory!  
13:33 <Enygma`> I`m wondering if a screenshot after maybe the second paragraph would be helpful, WDYT?  
13:33 <Enygma`> maybe this http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/download/Extension/XWebIDE+Application/WebIDE1.png?width=960 ?  
13:34 <yflory> Yes, good idea, I'm going to add it  
14:13 <vmassol> hmm  
14:13 <vmassol> any idea why i can't use annotatins on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Blog/Drafts/CreateApplicationsWithXWebIDE/ ?  
14:13 <vmassol> I vaguely remember an issue on xwiki.org but can't remember the details  
14:16 <ClemensR> I guess annotations do not work on structured content, only plain wiki pages, not an xwiki.org issue  
14:17 <ClemensR> ah, no its blog specific XWIKI-11947  
14:17 <vmassol> ClemensR: this page is not a blog, it's s standard page  
14:18 <vmassol> the issue is not having the annotation action  
14:19 <ClemensR> ah, I mistakenly assumed from the url its a blog post  
14:21 <ClemensR> hm, they are simply not active  
14:24 <ClemensR> save message is wrong, I just enabled annotations for the Blog.Drafts space ... seems one can enable/disable annotations for separate pages now  
14:26 <ClemensR> vmassol: are annotations working now for that page?  
14:33 <vmassol> checking  
14:33 <vmassol> nope  
14:33 <vmassol> they're still not in the menu  
14:33 <vmassol> AFAIK annotations are enabled byd efault anyway  
14:34 <vmassol> I'm on someone else ATM, don't worry, I'll debug this later on  
14:34 <ClemensR> ah, ok  
14:55 <tmortagne> acotiuga: by the way it cased you missed it, XPoll build fail since your last commit  
14:55 <tmortagne> see http://ci.xwiki.org/job/Contrib%20-%20XPoll%20Application/  
14:55 <lkrejci> has quit  
14:56 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
14:58 <tmortagne> Denis1: [ERROR] src/main/java/org/xwiki/mail/internal/factory/usersandgroups/AddressUserIterator.java:[110,16] (whitespace) WhitespaceAround: 'while' is not followed by whitespace.  
14:58 <tmortagne> (saw it in 7.4 branch but I guess its in all branches)  
15:03 <acotiuga> tmortagne: checking...  
15:04 <acotiuga> I think it's Jenkins again, since the builds didn't run  
15:04 <acotiuga> http://ci.xwiki.org/job/Contrib%20-%20XPoll%20Application/lastBuild/  
15:05 <acotiuga> while the change on the application was minor: https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/application-xpoll/commit/6c773d887645d9190795b3f570a7082937e4f8f4  
15:05 <tmortagne> it did run but failed with  Could not find artifact org.xwiki.contrib:application-xpoll:pom:1.6.5-SNAPSHOT  
15:06 <tmortagne> started the build again  
15:06 <tmortagne> and failed again for the same reason  
15:06 <tmortagne> does not looks like a Jenkins issue to me  
15:07 <tmortagne> but it does not seems related to your commit I agree  
15:07 <tmortagne> acotiuga: the issue is on https://github.com/xwiki-contrib/application-xpoll/blob/master/application-xpoll-test/pom.xml#L30  
15:08 <tmortagne> and the root issue is that it was badly released  
15:08 <acotiuga> ah, ok  
15:08 <tmortagne> i.e. integration-tests profile was not enabled during the last release  
15:08 <tmortagne> so it did not updated test modules pom files  
15:09 <tmortagne> "mvn release:prepare" is not enough for project with profiles like this  
15:09 <boubou> tmortagne can I use MariaDB packages with xwiki to replace mysql ?  
15:09 <boubou> I know its the same thing  
15:10 <tmortagne> acotiuga: so the version need to be incremented by hand and the project probably need some release documentation somewhere to not forget about it next time  
15:10 <tmortagne> boubou: I never tried but I don't see why it would not be possible, as you said it's the same thing  
15:11 <boubou> tmortagne on http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/InstallationMySQL, can I use the https://downloads.mariadb.org/connector-java/ ?  
15:11 <boubou> I think I willl need to test it  
15:11 <tmortagne> boubou: again I never tried so I can't confirm you anything, just test  
15:12 <boubou> I will share my experience...<  
15:12 <boubou> you always used the mysql packages if I understand ?  
15:13 <tmortagne> on my side I only used MySQL in production, I'm just used to MySQL so did not really tried anything else  
15:16 <acotiuga> has quit  
15:17 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
15:32 <sdumitriu1> has quit  
15:34 <acotiuga> tmortagne: XPoll fixed, but I was wondering, since most of the contrib applications have submodules, couldn't their pom parent version be updated at the same time ?  
15:42 <acotiuga> when "mvn release:prepare" ?  
15:43 <vmassol> mvn release:prepare modifies the version in al poms  
15:43 <vmassol> (all poms in the reactor when you execute it)  
15:46 <sdumitriu1> has joined #xwiki  
15:47 <tmortagne> acotiuga: it's because of the profile not because there is several modules  
15:47 <tmortagne> you just need to enable all the profile during the release  
15:48 <tmortagne> i.e. add -Pintegration-tests in this case  
15:55 <lkrejci> has quit  
15:56 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki

17:20 <Denis1> and I have even released a backport without any complains… I am not lucky

18:06 <vmassol> :)  
18:06 <vmassol> just need some little tuning and then I'll see what it takes to make an official image on dockerhub
